effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Traps the target.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Traps the target.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Traps the target.

short_effect.sun_moon: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Prevents the target from leaving battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the ground. Those hit can’t flee from battle.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the ground. Those hit can’t flee from battle.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the ground. Those it hits can’t flee from battle.
